item.title: git sparse checkout
item.description: One thing I missed after switching to git from svn was the ability to checkout a single directory. Well, it seems that the ability to partially checkout a repository was added to git in February of 2012, and I am way behind. Here is how you perform a sparse checkout: # Initialize git init [repo] cd [repo] # Fetch git remote add -f origin [url] # Configure git config core.sparsecheckout true echo "path/to/dir" >> .
